sentences.en: Bastion host server as gateway between the internal and external world.
sentences.cn: Bastion主机作为内部和外部世界之间的网关.

sentences.en: Could the character still use the Psychic Bastion feat in this circumstance?
sentences.cn: 这种情况下仍然可以使用“心力堡垒”专长么?

sentences.en: Each belligerent calls his own battle line a bastion of iron.
sentences.cn: 作战的双方,都把自己的战线称为铜墙铁壁.

sentences.en: Figure 7 - dual home bastion host with interior and exterior route.
sentences.cn: 图7 - 有内部和外部路由器的双重Bastion主机.

sentences.en: Figure 7 - dual home bastion host with interior and exterior route.
sentences.cn: 图7 - 有内部和外部路由器的双重bastion主机.

sentences.en: Football is a bastion of masculinity in this area.
sentences.cn: 在该地区足球是男子汉的天地.

sentences.en: Ip forwarding must be turned off in the bastion host.
sentences.cn: 在bastion主机内的IP转发必须关闭.

sentences.en: Like an iron bastion, the dam withstood the rushing floodwaters.
sentences.cn: 大坝好似铜墙铁壁, 顶住了洪水的冲击.

sentences.en: Ours is truly a bastion of iron.
sentences.cn: 在我们这方面,确实是铜墙铁壁.

sentences.en: Pearl Harbor was the principal American bastion in the Pacific.
sentences.cn: 珍珠港曾是美国在太平洋上的重要军事据点。

sentences.en: Romania, under its president , Traian Basescu , is a bastion of Atlanticism in the Black Sea region.
sentences.cn: 罗马尼亚在现任总统特来安?巴塞斯库领导下已经成为了大西洋主义在黑海地区的坚固堡垒.

sentences.en: The British belief in the " bastion of Empire " was infectious.
sentences.cn: 英国人对于 “ 帝国的铜墙铁壁 ” 的信仰是有感染力的.

sentences.en: The right or left side of a bastion.
sentences.cn: 防御工事的左侧或右侧.

sentences.en: Thought Bastion: This shield protects the wielder as the Psychic Bastion feat.
sentences.cn: 思维堡垒: 该盾牌如同“心力堡垒”专长那样保护持用者.

sentences.en: Was ? atalh ? y ü k the bastion of female power it has been thought to be?
sentences.cn: 查脱户耶克果真像那些朝圣者所认为的,是个由女性当家的城 吗 ?

trans.tran_cn: 棱堡，堡垒，设防地区，阵地工事
trans.tran_en: something that protects a way of life, principle etc that seems likely to change or end completely
